constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 42 (Wednesday, March 9, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. FOSTER:
H.R. 7022.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This bill is enacted pursuant to the power granted to
Congress under Article I, Section 8, Clauses 1 and 18 of the
United States Constitution.
[Page H1424]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute by the Yeas and Nays: 24 - 22.

title: Strengthening Cybersecurity for the Financial Sector Act of 2022
